editorialSummary.text: Lincoln Center outdoor bandshell with landscaped grounds & benches named for a noted musical family.

originalText.text: The Big Apple Circus welcomes ‚ÄúRoncalli‚Äù.  Love love love this placeüôåüèæ. Went here with my family and man was I impressed. This was my very first time ever in my entire life going to a circus play. We went to see The Big Apple Circus üé™ ü§° show ‚ÄúRONCALLI‚Äù and man I was literally blown away. From the performances to the scenery to the structure of the show it was amazing. First off I would not consider myself a big circus fan but I was soo impressed with everything that after leaving the show I called everyone in my family to tell them what they had missed and that we all have to go see it together again. Very very impressive show and extremely talented actors omg they were all unbelievableüò≥üôåüèæ. The venue was packed and cold but after entering the building honestly you would forget all about that. They had lots of places to take pics and videos and the artwork was very very detailed and very beautifully done. I would highly recommend anyone and everyone to visit whenever they are in town and if the Big Apple Circus üé™ is open because I believe it‚Äôs a seasonal event but I‚Äôm not sure, you can Google it just to be sure and for more info. The bathroom was outdoors though and it was freezing in NYC that day so bear in mind that you will need a nice jacket to keep you warm.  My daughter is 12 and she was very happy with the show from start to finish. It‚Äôs a very kid friendly show that parents along with their children will definitely enjoy watching. There‚Äôs also a concession area where you can take pics, buy food and gifts and merchandise from the show. You will also see the actors walking by in the concession area (picnic area) where they would take pics with the kids or anyone who asks for a photo. The actors were very nice and social and the staff were very professional and helpful. Enjoyed every minute of this experience and recommend everyone to go see it especially with the kids. You will enjoy it.

originalText.text: Had a great time at the  LOC free events. Seats are tied together to keep in place - just needs a little more space between rows. Venue is clean, well maintained and security is friendly yet  precise. Walking distance to a lot of trains.

originalText.text: Had such a great time , my girls and husband loved the circus. This was my youngest first time at the circus, they had a blast. Tickets were 20 dollars seats were great . You can sit anywhere and see the ring easily.
